Articles.Content:
This is Canberras Recent attempt at a space weapons platform.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/iLX35qkNjKY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

![7nqZXXT.png](http://i.imgur.com/7nqZXXT.png)

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/MG0is)

"Pictures of the Evolution and trials of the CCS Attila"

*Featuring Reactive armour, Two Cargo bays for transporting cargo, Dual missile barrel, and support of up to a seven kerbal crew.*

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-10T16:02:49Z" title="08/10/2015 04:02  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 10, 2015</time> by Canberra Gaming**

New pictures of the WIP.

*Battle Stations Men!*

![s1GRebi.png](http://i.imgur.com/s1GRebi.png)

*Full Speed Ahead!*

![pz5Yonk.png](http://i.imgur.com/pz5Yonk.png)

Macey has GOT to see this!

-proceeds to drool endlessly in amazement-
If I wasn't hitting a lag wall I would love to post a video. Sadly AMD and KSP don't mix.
Meh, I prefer my posterus class, with faster missiles if lighter, and double armor. But, a nice ship nonetheless.

I don't know about the armour part. The Reactive armour can stop most armament. My reactive armour is just Wings over structural panels which gives it a better looking effect with the ability of being able to slow down missiles before impacting the main armour.

mine is double layered structural, spaced in most places. The worst damage that it has taken is 14 direct hits from smaller missiles at high velocities, and the ship was cut in half but still functional. In other tests, the armor was torn off by the 10th hit.
Care if I take a crack at it?
Nope, give it a shot. I don't guarantee the armor vs a 1.25 m missile.
Would rep you here, but I have to wait. Nice craft anyway. Prettier than mine.
It's not about looks. It's functionality. I went for an Infinity class type warship for both scientific and military uses. Also there's a short test video up front now.
what are you firing it at? Also, I don't doubt its functionality, but it does has its flaws, as all ships do. Out of curiosity, what is the Delta-v?

Kerbal engineer needs downloaded for that. Laziness levels skyrocketed. I'm still working on the configurations. I'm planning on adding drop tanks as well as drop pods soon so this is just the prototype. It is however combat ready right now so I will do some tests. OFF TO RECORD!
I use kerbal engineer, I could tell you the Delta-v if you want. I just want a Download clicky link myself.
Tonnage and stats are posted in the Album.
